name: ZBVI
description: ZBVI is the principal commercial and only "AM" radio station in the British Virgin Islands. ZBVI focuses on world and local news, community activities, sports, land and marine weather forecasts. The listener enjoys a mix of Adult Contemporary, Religious and Caribbean Music.

name: Joy Gospel Radio FM/ZJoy VI
description: Joy Gospel Radio FM/ZJoy VI is a 24 hour Online Gospel Radio Station based on Tortola, Virgin Islands, UK. Our Divine CEO is Jesus Christ. We are truly reJOYcing as we welcome you to our Family!

name: Ol' Skool Rockabilly Radio
description:
Ol' Skool Rockabilly Radio is one of the best ROCKABILLY RADIO's ever, It's A flashback in time to where Rockabilly Music lived. We spin the best HIT's 24 hours a day 7 days a week from our huge record collection of over 4000 rare and unique tracks. Around the clock NONSTOP music straight back from the 50's, spiced up with just a tiny bit of the sound of todays Rockabilly bands.
	Show more

name: Soggy Dollar Radio
description: Coming to you live from one of the most beautiful places on Earth, our friends at the Soggy Dollar Bar in White Bay on Jost Van Dyke bring us the new Soggy Dollar Radio.

name: Kool FM 1000
description: Kool FM 1000, home for hot releases in all kinds of music and adults only conversations on the weekends. Online requests, discussions, blogs and WhatsApp social.
